JobFullDesc:
Don’t just work for a market leading global company. Help grow one.
The American Express Network enables over $1.2 Trillion in annual spend and serves card Issuers and Acquirers in over 170 markets worldwide. Network Solutions and Operations (NSO) operates the American Express Network with the highest levels of performance, security, and integrity; and is supporting Network coverage expansion by onboarding new Network Issuers and Acquirers, and launching a new Network in China. The NSO team is also driving a strategic, multi-year transformation to modernize the Network creating innovative products, services, and capabilities that will anticipate the needs of customers by enabling more types of payments.
The Network Product Development Team is a critical part of the NSO organization, and is accountable for leading the strategy, design, development, and ongoing management of Network products, services, and capabilities. This role will join the Proximity Payments team focused on EMV Chip capabilities.
We are looking for a highly motivated, product manager who is  an expert in EMV Chip knowledge with a passion for emerging payment technologies to join our team.   In this role as a Manager of Product Development and Management this individual will lead key initiatives that will enhance our EMV Chip capabilities in response to emerging industry trends and business needs. 
This individual will collaborate with partner teams across American Express to understand the business needs and pain points; conduct competitive research and have an informed view of industry insights to recommend and deliver new and enhanced requirements for our Chip capabilities.   
You will collaborate internally with the Product team members, stakeholders in technology, certification, policy and externally with key vendor partners to execute delivery of the new capabilities and enhanced capabilities.  
The Manager of Product Development & Management in the Proximity Payment Team will focus on the following key responsibilities:  

Collaborate with product team, technologies to align on product roadmap including new product features, enhanced services, updates to specifications, as required to deliver on the overarching strategy
Monitor relevant industry trends, competitive landscape, digital trends, and market regulations to develop the right strategy to achieve business objectives
Define capabilities for new payment products and services, identify/prioritize use cases, and design “minimum viable product” features and user stories to ensure a focus on delivering maximum value
Lead development collaborating with Technology, Operations, Policy, Legal, Compliance, etc. to deliver the flawless execution on time and within budget
Provide SME consulting to Product team and stakeholders to help develop the best approach to solve for delivering on new business opportunities

 
Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations
 

EMV CHIP SME, you are deeply knowledge about the interworking of EMV Chip technology and have experience implement payment capabilities
Passion for payments and fintech, you are excited about emerging payments and keep your finger on the pulse of industry developments across the technological and regulatory landscape (e.g., faster payments, biometrics, etc.)
Strategic thinker, you have experience developing strategy, are intellectually curious and have superb problem-solving and analytical skills to help us stay at the forefront of innovation
Excellent project manager, you have superior organizational skills and attention to detail with the ability to autonomously manage several objectives in parallel and drive results in a fast-paced, multi-partner environment
Effective communicator and influencer, excellent written and oral communication skills, proficient in developing excellent quality presentations and deliverables for an executive audience
Ability to indirectly influence a wide range of diverse stakeholders and mobilize and lead cross-functional teams
Collaborative team player, ability to collaborate with internal stakeholders and effectively operate in ambiguity, white space, and quickly-evolving priorities
Office proficiency, you are fluent in Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint with a general understanding of data analysis techniques
